function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of theoretical insights on the role of 5G in pandemic prevention and control","Impact":"Inability to effectively leverage 5G for pandemic prevention and control","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to understand the underlying mechanisms of 5G's role in pandemic prevention and control","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of distributed work on distance decay","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of interactions due to geographical distance","Mitigation":"Developing strategies for managing distance decay in distributed work environments","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, virtual communication tools","People":"Organizations, remote workers","Owner":"Human resources departments, organizational leaders"},{"Description":"Concepts like \"death of distance\" and \"friction of distance\" minimizing the impact of geographical distance","Impact":"Potential underestimation of the implications of geographical distance on interactions and costs","Mitigation":"Considering the limitations of geographical distance even in the presence of virtual technologies","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, virtual collaboration technologies","People":"Businesses, researchers","Owner":"Technology companies, research institutions"}]}
